Ipywidgets in Quarto example

import pandas as pd
import ipywidgets as widgets
from ipywidgets import interact, interact_manual

Read in some data

df = pd.read_csv("pip_dataset (2).csv")
@interact
def show_ppp_version(version=2011):
    return df.loc[df["ppp_version"] == version]
